recipesJson.name: Caramel Pear
recipesJson.author: bqbdm8
recipesJson.description: A juicy pear drizzled in caramel. Inawera pear is the main player and is upfront at 3% along with the marzipan which pairs perfectly with a lingering caramel exhale.

reviews.text: Not a bad recipe by any means... I just find that the INW Pear is a little overpowering the caramel for my taste... maybe it's just the % used (inawera is pretty strong) or maybe it could benefit from a combination of a couple different pears... (once again just my opinion)
